name: Rent-A-Friend-Radio HALLOWEEN!
description:
Explore the Rent-A-Friend Radio Studios on this Halloween Night! Rent-A-Friend invites you to the annual chill cook off, gives you two more ways to know that God exists, and shows how pumpkins prove that Atheism is absurd. Also, new pictures from some of our friends, and a song from 5 Penny Theatre! Things to see, things to listen to, and things to grab and throw into the eternal abyss of doom. Happy Halloween from Rent-A-Friend Radio!

ASKrentafriend@gmail.com
